Title: Enacts the "safer health care facility construction act"
Summary: Enacts the "safer health care facility construction act"; requires the commissioner of health to adopt infection control risk assessment (ICRA) standards to reduce the risk from infection in all health care facilities; requires all construction work performed on a new health care facility and on the expansion of an existing health care facility to be compliant with ICRA standards; requires people performing construction work on a health care facility be certified in compliance with ICRA standards.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to enacting the "safer health care facility construction act"
